english.segment1: Well it breaks my heart. Every time I see the world break yours in two. You know those lies ain't true. When you let 'em get to you. Being you is hard to be, I see
english.segment2: These days sticks and stones. Sound like paradise. Compared to those harsh words. They'd rather cut you down then hold you. But they don't know you like I know you. If they did, I know they'd see, Yes, they would see..
english.segment3: To me you are. Heaven's finest invention by far. So much brighter than the brightest star. And what I'd give to make you see. Who you are to me
english.segment4: All your so called friends. Said they'd be there till the bitter end (all gone). But I won't be just like the others. I'm gonna to show you my true colors. You can't ever make me leave. No, no, I won't ever leave
english.segment5: To me you are. Heaven's finest invention by far. Even brighter than the brightest star. And what I'd give to make you see. Who you are to me
english.segment6: When you laugh it's my favorite song. And all the gray is gone. Every single time I see you smile. I just haven't seen it in awhile
english.segment7: So go on and dream. Bigger dreams than this town's ever seen before. There are just two kinds of people: Ones who say you're just not able. And the ones who change the world. And you're gonna change the world
english.segment8: To me you are. Heaven's finest invention by far. Even brighter than the brightest star. And what I'd give to make you see. Who you are to me. ..to me.
